718654f-a.text:
Charlton Street, north side, west from and including Greenwich Street, to and including West Street, showing in the foreground clearing where the Standard Statistics Building (see Hudson Street) will rise. No. 111 Charlton Street, adjoining 551 Greenwich Street, the house at the N.E. corner, is the only Charlton Street house left in this block.

Demolition of the warehouses, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Washington Street, will begin in July of this year (see West Street).

April 23, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.
718654f-a.folder: Charlton Street & Greenwich Street, Manhattan, NY

718653f-a.text:
Charlton Street, east from Greenwich Street. The elevated structure shown on the latter is the Ninth Ave. system.

September 1, 1934.
Irvin Fitterman.
